appExtension.title: Enable Preloadify in your theme
appExtension.content: Preloadify Theme Extension is disabled, please enable it for Preloadify to work properly with your current theme.

activatedPreloader.title: Activated Preloader
activatedPreloader.content: This preloader is currently active on your store:

skeleton.title: Ready to make your store's loading experience look fantastic?
skeleton.content: Start by customizing the preloader to your liking. Then, activate it on your store.

contents.details: Input as many details as you can. If you have a solution to suggest, also input here.
contents.references: Add references (video, screenshot, file, etc.) to clarify about your feedback.

errors.required: Please fill in the details field
errors.generic: Failed to submit feature request. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

language.title: User interface
language.label: Language
language.help: Select the language of the app user interface. This doesn't affect the display language on your online store or of other collaborators.

preloaderSettings.title: Preloaders
preloaderSettings.description: We support the following preloaders. Choose the filter below to see the available preloaders.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Choose the colors for your preloader, some preloaders may support Primary color only

speed.title: Animation Speed
speed.description: Choose the animation speed for preloader
